div.head: 時疾熱瘡
div.div: heat sores associated with seasonal ailments

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: heat sores associated with seasonal ailments

sense.def: Alternative Names shi ji re biao chuang 時疾熱熛瘡 , flaming-heat sores associated with seasonal ailments. Pathological Condition of re chuang 熱瘡 , heat sores, developing in the aftermath of shi ji 時 疾 , seasonal ailments. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry xiao mai 小麥：麩，涼。治時疾熱瘡，湯火 瘡爛，撲損傷折瘀血，醋炒貼罯 , “Cold bran cures heat sores associated with seasonal ailments ; festering sores resulting from boiling water and fire; bruises, injuries, fractures, and stagnant blood [that has left the vessels]. Stir-fry in vinegar and apply locally”.
